pullrequest.title: Move log examples to the main example directory

content.raw:
I made a branch ([issue_87_grey](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-transport/branch/issue_87_grey?dest=issue_87#diff)) where I attempt to clean up the cmake a bit. Feel free to merge it if it looks good to you.

Most of the changes are superficial, but there are two functional changes:

* `log` is now an optional component instead of a required component. The configuration will pass even if the log component is missing; it will simply skip over the examples that require the `log` component.
* I took out the lines to copy the dlls, because that's a very fragile approach to building, and I don't think we should be encouraging it.
content.html:
I made a branch (issue_87_grey) where I attempt to clean up the cmake a bit. Feel free to merge it if it looks good to you.

Most of the changes are superficial, but there are two functional changes:

  • log is now an optional component instead of a required component. The configuration will pass even if the log component is missing; it will simply skip over the examples that require the log component.
  • I took out the lines to copy the dlls, because that's a very fragile approach to building, and I don't think we should be encouraging it.
